info.name: Taskmanji API Collection
info.description: This is the Postman collection for Taskmanji. It contains all the API routes organized into modules like user, tasks, and projects.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Default Pipeline",
  "startStatus": "Pending",
  "statuses": [
		{ "name": "Pending", "type": "Pending" },
		{ "name": "In Progress", "type": "In Progress" },
		{ "name": "Completed", "type": "Completed" },
		{ "name": "Cancelled", "type": "Cancelled" },
		{ "name": "On Hold", "type": "On Hold" },
		{ "name": "Awaiting Approval", "type": "Awaiting Approval" },
		{ "name": "Reopened", "type": "Reopened" },
		{ "name": "Closed", "type": "Closed" },
		{ "name": "Reassigned", "type": "Reassigned" }
	],
  "transitions": [
		{ "from": "Pending", "to": ["In Progress", "Cancelled", "On Hold", "Awaiting Approval", "Reassigned"] },
		{ "from": "In Progress", "to": ["Completed", "Cancelled", "On Hold", "Awaiting Approval", "Reassigned"] },
		{ "from": "On Hold", "to": ["In Progress", "Cancelled", "Awaiting Approval", "Reassigned"] },
		{ "from": "Awaiting Approval", "to": ["In Progress", "Cancelled", "On Hold", "Reassigned"] },
		{ "from": "Reassigned", "to": ["In Progress", "Cancelled", "On Hold", "Awaiting Approval"] },
		{ "from": "Completed", "to": ["Reopened"] },
		{ "from": "Reopened", "to": ["In Progress", "Cancelled", "Completed", "Reassigned"] }
	]
}

{
    "title": "New Task",
    "description": "Task description",
    "statusPipelineId": "status-pipeline-id",
    "priority": "high", //"high", "medium", "normal", "low"
    "jobs": [
        {
            "jobId": "job-id",
            "title": "Job Title",
            "description": "Job Description",
            "assignee": "user-id",
            "startTime": "2023-10-01T10:00:00Z",
            "endTime": "2023-10-01T12:00:00Z",
            "statusPipelineId": "status-pipeline-id",
            "note": "Hello", // Job Level
            "billable": false
        }
    ],
    "assets": [],
    "client": "client-id",
    "note": "Hello" //Task Level
}

query.description: Field to sort by (e.g., createdAt, updatedAt)
Filter for billable tasks (true or false)
Filter for tasks with invoices raised (true or false)
Filter by priority (high, medium, normal, low)

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Updated Job Title",
    "description": "Updated Job Description",
    "assignee": "user-id",
    "startTime": "2023-10-01T08:00:00Z",
    "endTime": "2023-10-01T12:00:00Z",
    "status": "Completed",
    "statusPipelineId": "status-pipeline-id",
    "note": "Hello", //Job Level
    "billable": true,
    "invoiceRaised": false
}

item.name: Add Note to Job in Task

query.description: Field to sort by (e.g., createdAt, updatedAt)
Filter for billable jobs (true or false)
Filter for jobs with invoices raised (true or false)
Filter by job priority (high, medium, normal, low)
(Optional) The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.
(Optional) The number of notifications to return per page. Defaults to 10.
